description.value:
School enchantment (compulsion) [mind-affecting, emotion]; Level alchemist 3, bard 2, bloodrager 3, mesmerist 2, psychic 3, sorcerer/wizard 3, summoner 3, unchained Summoner 3, witch 3; Domain Destruction 3, Madness 3; Subdomain Demon 3, Ferocity 3; Bloodline Abyssal 3, Boreal 2, Orc 3;

Casting Time 1 standard action
Components V, S

Range medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)
Targets one willing living creature per three levels, no two of which may be more than 30 ft. apart
Duration concentration + 1 round/level
Saving Throw none; Spell Resistance yes

Description

Each affected creature gains a +2 morale bonus to Strength and Constitution, a +1 morale bonus on Will saves, and a -2 penalty to AC. The effect is otherwise identical with a barbarian's rage except that the subjects aren't fatigued at the end of the rage.
